text: William Alexander Higgins (born 1870) was an English footballer who played as a full-back. Born in Smethwick, Staffordshire, he played for Manchester United, Albion Swifts, Birmingham St George's, Grimsby Town, Bristol City, Newcastle United and Middlesbrough. ==External links== *Profile at MUFCInfo.com Category:1869 births Category:English footballers Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Newcastle United F.C. players Category:Bristol City F.C. players Category:Middlesbrough F.C. players Category:Year of death missing Category:Association football fullbacks
title: Alexander Higgins (footballer, born 1869)
